data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Leon.
In Leon Atlas attack through Renato Ibarra. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 1, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Leon.
Atlas will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Leon.
In the minute 4, Leon are coming forward and Angel Mena gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Atlas a goal kick.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Leon in the half of Atlas.
Leon to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Leon's Fernando Navarro gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Leon. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Atlas's Renato Ibarra gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Leon have a goal kick.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Goal! Renato Ibarra gives Atlas a 0-1 lead in Leon.
Great play from Ignacio Malcorra to set up the goal.
Free kick Leon.
In the minute 11, Leon's Luis Montes misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Leon.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Leon close to the penalty box.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 17, Luciano Acosta's header is off-target for Atlas.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Leon are pushing forward but Luis Montes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 24, Nicolas Sosa (Leon) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Leon.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Angel Mena (Leon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 28, Nicolas Sosa (Leon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Atlas have a goal kick.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Leon.
Emanuel Gigliotti for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Emanuel Gigliotti grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Leon.
Fernando Navarro instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 37, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Leon have got their heads in front thanks to a Fernando Navarro strike.
That's a fine assist from Angel Mena.
In the minute 39, In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Attention is being given to Atlasâ€™s Edgar Zaldivar and play has been suspended briefly.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, Diego Cocca (Atlas) is making a first change, with Edyairth Ortega replacing the possibly injured Edgar Zaldivar.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Atlas throw-in in Leon's half.
Leon drive upfield and Luis Montes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlas defender.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Leon.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a throw-in for Leon, close to Atlas's area.
At Estadio Leon the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Leon have a dangerous throw-in.
Leon's Pedro Aquino breaks free at Estadio Leon. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 45, At Estadio Leon, Ignacio Malcorra has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Atlas's Renato Ibarra has been booked in Leon.
The second-half is underway in Leon.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Atlas.
In the minute 50, Javier Correa (Atlas) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leon needs to be cautious. Atlas have an attacking throw-in.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Leon a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Leon.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Atlas.
Atlas surge into the attack at Estadio Leon but Javier Correaâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
In the minute 54, Edyairth Ortega (Atlas) has received a yellow card from Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Atlas are coming forward and Luciano Acosta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Atlas.
German Conti for Atlas has been booked by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Leon.
Leon's Pedro Aquino misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
In the minute 59, Atlas to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Throw-in Leon.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 61, Emanuel Gigliotti for Leon drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Leon.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, At Estadio Leon, Edyairth Ortega has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In Leon Leon drive forward through Yairo Moreno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 70, In Leon Leon attack through Nicolas Sosa. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Leon to check on Luciano Acosta, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Jairo Torres (Atlas) has replaced the possibly injured Luciano Acosta at Estadio Leon.
Leon are pushing forward but Fernando Navarro's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Leon.
Free kick Atlas.
William Tesillo for Leon has been booked by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Leon make their second substitution with David Ramirez replacing Jean Meneses.
The home team replace Emanuel Gigliotti with Joel Campbell.
Can Atlas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leon's half?
In the minute 80, Leon's Luis Montes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Atlas a goal kick.
Free kick Atlas.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Leon.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 83, Leon have a goal kick.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Leon.
In the minute 85, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Leon.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Leon throw-in in Atlas's half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 89, Ignacio Jeraldino is on a sub for Javier Correa for Atlas.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Leon.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Leon throw-in in Atlas's half.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Angel Mena of Leon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Atlas have a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Osvaldo Rodriguez is replacing Pedro Aquino for Leon at Estadio Leon.
